registro_inteligente.title: Smart Record
subtitle: A ToDoList is useful, but sometimes you need more.
Developed to help my dad, making his work more practical.
registro_inteligente.short_description: Mobile App for recording deliveries and generating a report for accountability purposes.
registro_inteligente.description:
The mobile app "Registro Inteligente" was developed exclusively for my dad. After observing his workflow and talking to him, I realized that he manually recorded the routes he worked (cities), the daily rate, and the date. Every 15 days, he would fill out a spreadsheet, scan it, and send it to the service-providing company. To improve this process, I developed a mobile application that allows these records to be stored directly on the phone. At the end of the month, with a single click, the app generates a spreadsheet in the same structure he previously used.
The project was initially built using React Native and Expo, and later rewritten in TypeScript.
